author: jbeard
msg: Now works in webkit. Had to work around strange behaviour where events were not being dispatched to svg root element.

author: jbeard
msg: jquery svg's addClass was causing erratic behaviour in Opera and Chromium, so swapped it out for less scalable, but more reliable DOM manipulation

author: jbeard
msg: Everything works in the drawing tool demo (tested in Firefox).

author: jbeard
msg: Toggling between states now works. Special history-oriented behaviour of the drawing tool demo now works.
